title: Colorado Firm Recalls Chili Products Due to Mislabeling and an Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, Feb. 16, 2011 – Gold Star Sausage, a Denver, CO establishment is recalling approximately an undetermined of chili products because they contain an undeclared allergen, soy, which is not declared on the label. Soy is a known allergen. The following products are subject to...
impacted_products: 16 oz. plastic containers of “Johnson’s Chili, Hot & Spicy”
